docs.lead_paragraph: The U.S. government's monthly budget returned to deficit in May after a big April surplus. But the overall imbalance so far is far smaller than it was the same period last year, putting the country on track for the lowest annual deficit in six years.

headline.main: US Records $130 Billion Budget Deficit in May
headline.print_headline: US Records $130 Billion Budget Deficit in May

docs.snippet: The U.S. government's monthly budget returned to deficit in May after a big April surplus. But the overall imbalance so far is far smaller than it was the same period last year, putting the country on track for the lowest annual deficit in six years.

docs.abstract: Project ECHO is a “disruptive innovation” that uses video to train clinicians to perform like specialists in underserved areas. Used more widely it could transform health care.

docs.lead_paragraph: Insurers want to change President Barack Obama's health care law to provide financial assistance for people buying bare-bones coverage. That would entice the healthy and the young, the industry says, holding down premiums.

docs.lead_paragraph: Advancements include Medicare covering gender reassignment surgery, an evaluation of the military’s senseless ban on transgender service and Maryland’s law extending civil rights protections.

headline.main: Progress on Transgender Rights and Health
headline.print_headline: Progress on Transgender Rights and Health

docs.abstract: Editorial welcomes progress on transgender rights in health care; praises Obama administration's decision to reverse 1981 policy that excluded gender reassignment surgery from coverage under Medicare; also notes Defense Department's new willingness to review ban on transgender military service and updated policy concerning gender designation on birth certificates in New York State.
docs.snippet: Advancements include Medicare covering gender reassignment surgery, an evaluation of the military’s senseless ban on transgender service and Maryland’s law extending civil rights protections.
